favourite.article: In the midst of all this flood related work may You have a rich flowing out. Live Yourself through us Lord with riches and splendor.
Lord, may Your life fill us day by day so we can co-work with You by the outflow of the life within us.
The Lord Jesus and the Father were not working separately. On the contrary, the Lord was working with the Father as one. Hallelujah!!!!
Cng tc đng đắn đ l tun đổ sự sống.
Praise the Lord that the overflow of life is work! Oh brothers and sisters, the work should be our living!
